Question: It was while in grade four that this person first became involved in drama, under the tutelage of George Steinburg.
Hints: In mid-2011, this person started shooting the movie Rock of Ages, in which he played the character Stacee Jaxx.
In 2007, this person took a rare supporting role for the second time in Lions for Lambs, which was a commercial disappointment.
This person and six other boys put on an improvised play to music called IT at the Carlton Elementary School drama festival.
